title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 479.12 - Reinstatement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 479.12 - Reinstatement

State Regulations

An accused member who has been suspended pending a hearing
and is found not guilty of the charges filed against him shall be entitled to
be immediately reinstated to his position and to receive back-pay for the
period he was suspended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
479.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
